sentences.sentence: The value of India increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2018; while China keep stable between 2010 and 2018.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018 in China is greatly lower India.

sentences.sentence: The value of India increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2018; while China keep stable between 2010 and 2018.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018 in China is greatly lower India.
